description: a whatsapp bot created by mvelase technology

SESSION_ID.description: Put your SESSION_ID here. Make sure it starts with techsync-md-

MODE.description: Bot mode can be public, private, inbox, or groups (in lowercase) (e.g., public)

ANTI_LINK.description: Bot delete or kick links sender from group, To Enable put true and to disable put false (e.g, true)

ALWAYS_ONLINE.description: Keep your WhatsApp always online put true to activate (e.g, true)
